allocates a region in the detail cache.

public methods

make sure the width and height are acceptable sizes.

check to see if the region can fit in the current row. If not, advance to the next free row.

advance to the next row.

make sure there is enough room in the cache for the region requested. If there isn't, simply return false to indicate allocation failure.

update the packing state.

return true to indicate success.
